thread.title: Stay invested in HDFC Top 200: Dhirendra Kumar

title: Stay invested in HDFC Top 200: Dhirendra Kumar
text: Stay invested in HDFC Top 200: Dhirendra Kumar 01 Jul 2015, 4:06PM IST Copy URL Embed Value Research CEO Dhirendra Kumar says that despite a dip in the year-to-date returns of HDFC Top 200 fund, investors should stay invested as it has a very good long term track record. The fund focuses on large-cap stocks. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes NOW SHOWING
